hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 巡逻，大声呵斥

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

hobby.jp: 哲学書を読むこと
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 读哲学书

name.zh_cn: 备品使用后，要清洁干净归还原位

desc.en: Sensei and Hifumi take a tank to the beach, but a sudden wave drenches the tank in sea water... Hifumi starts cleaning the tank to prevent it from rusting.
desc.jp: Sensei and Hifumi take a tank to the beach, but a sudden wave drenches the tank in sea water... Hifumi starts cleaning the tank to prevent it from rusting.
desc.zh_cn: 搭战车去海边玩的老师与{cf日步美}。但是突如其来的海浪使得战车被海水给弄湿了……{cf日步美}为了不让战车生锈而开始刷洗。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
夏季限定的佩洛洛大人周边

hobby.en: Collecting Peroro merch, shopping, listening to others
hobby.jp: ペロログッズ集め、可愛いもの集め、ショッピング、相談に乗ること
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 收集佩洛洛周边、收集可爱的物品、购物、与人相谈
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 收集佩洛洛商品、购物、与人谈心
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 收集佩洛洛周边玩具、购物、做倾听者

desc.en: Mashiro packs a bunch of popsicles and soft drinks to prevent her from suffering a heatstroke. Sensei and Mashiro share a popsicle after some intense training.
desc.jp: Mashiro packs a bunch of popsicles and soft drinks to prevent her from suffering a heatstroke. Sensei and Mashiro share a popsicle after some intense training.
desc.zh_cn: 在海边等待训练的{cf麻白}为了防止中暑，准备了许多冰棍与清凉饮料。进行了艰辛的训练以后，老师与{cf麻白}一起吃冰棍。

hobby.jp: 高いところに登る、観察日記を書く
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 登上高处、记录观察日记

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: 狙击手与烟雾皆喜欢高处

hobby.jp: 高いところに登る、観察日記を書く
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 登上高处、记录观察日记

name.zh_cn: 于夏天海边的游玩方式

desc.en: Sensei prepares several methods to help Tsurugi learn to play in the water. Each of them was a little different, but they still have a good time.
desc.jp: Sensei prepares several methods to help Tsurugi learn to play in the water. Each of them was a little different, but they still have a good time.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为了不知道怎么在海边玩耍的{cf弦生}而准备了几个方式。虽然有些部分不太一样，但还是度过了愉快的时光。

name.zh_cn: 夏天的大海 憧憬 感慨

desc.en: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.
desc.jp: The 47th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for the Tea Party members and a notable song in Volume 3. It is often used with the related backgrounds.

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.jp:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.

desc.en: Hifumi grows tired from the unexpected situations and starts to become desperate. The thugs then attack again, just as Hifumi was afraid of.
desc.jp: Hifumi grows tired from the unexpected situations and starts to become desperate. The thugs then attack again, just as Hifumi was afraid of.
desc.zh_cn: 因为接连而来的突发状况而感到疲惫的{cf日步美}呈现自暴自弃的状态。然后如{cf日步美}所预想，太妹们又再次攻了进来。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.jp:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.jp:
The students head for the ocean to achieve their objectives.
The girls' struggle to fulfill the wish listbegins!
desc.zh_cn:
为了达成各自的目的而前往海边的学生们。
为了达成许愿清单的少女们，开始孤军奋战！

desc.en: The Prefect Team arrives at the beach for summer boot camp. Ako hears of an all-out war between troublemakers on an otherwise peaceful beach. She decides to put a stop to it, without telling Hina.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team arrives at the beach for summer boot camp. Ako hears of an all-out war between troublemakers on an otherwise peaceful beach. She decides to put a stop to it, without telling Hina.
desc.zh_cn: 老师和{cn风纪委员会}以夏季集训的名义，来到了阿拉巴海岸。那里原本是以幽静而闻名的场所……但不知为何，头盔团与太妹将于4小时候展开全面战争。为了不让{cf阳奈}委员长知道，{cn风纪委员会}决定想办法处理此问题。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 巡逻，大声呵斥

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

name.en: The Head Prefect Needs a Break
name.jp: The Head Prefect Needs a Break

name.en: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry
name.jp: Plans Are Destined to Go Awry

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: Sensei and the Prefect Team head to the ocean to give Hina a vacation! But the troubles keep mounting! Will Sensei and the Prefect Team be able to give Hina a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn: 为了让{cf阳奈}能好好休个假，{cn风纪委员会}和老师一起来到了海边。但麻烦事却接二连三地发生，使得{cn风纪委员会}陷入一片慌乱……{cf阳奈}委员长的暑假，究竟会如何呢！？

desc.en: Ui asks that the existence of the memorial capsule not be revealed and places the map inside as well. Hanako and Sensei deliver an incomplete report to Sakurako to hide their decision. When all's said and done, Ui displays mixed feelings about now having more people in her life she has to act friendly towards.
desc.jp: Ui asks that the existence of the memorial capsule not be revealed and places the map inside as well. Hanako and Sensei deliver an incomplete report to Sakurako to hide their decision. When all's said and done, Ui displays mixed feelings about now having more people in her life she has to act friendly towards.
desc.zh_cn: {cf忧}的请求是，不要向外人公开纪念时光胶囊的存在，并把地图和卷轴一起保留下来。{cf花子}和老师只交给{cf樱子}调查结果的一部分。所有事情结束后，{cf忧}表示自己要亲切以待的人变多了，流露出复杂又微妙的情绪。

desc.en: trinity old church corridor daytime sunlight gold yellow
desc.jp: trinity old church corridor daytime sunlight gold yellow

hobby.zh_cn_jp: 祈祷

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！
